contentIntro1: Introducing the smart fire alert system from Group 12 of the IoT class, a fast and accurate solution for emergency situations.
contentIntro2: Our app instantly connects with the nearest fire department, ensuring quick and safe responses to any fire incident.
contentIntro3: Protecting lives and property has never been easier. Be ready to handle any danger with just a single tap.
